text:
Anatoly Ivanovich Lukyanov () (7 May 1930 – 9 January 2019) was a Russian Communist politician. He was the Chairman of the Supreme Soviet of the USSR between 15 March 1990 and 22 August 1991.
Lukyanov died in Moscow on 9 January 2019, at the age of 88, after suffering from a serious illness.

annotations.surface_form: Chairman of the Supreme Soviet of the USSR
